name: Cats in the Space
description:
New iTunes App. This time we created a tactical twin-stick shooter feline epic game, Cats In Space! — Magic Fly based on Cats in the Space movement created in the British internet community. Basically it is the story of a galactic cat that is receiving a very funny perruna invasion.

Battle the canines of Grolich— and lead Meowfyre to victory… or doom.
